Show HN: Create Repeating Google Calendar Event for Last Day of Month

stories.text: So I recently started thinking about how much it might cost Google to have so many different domain names. And then that got boring so I wondered if there are any companies outside of FAANG that have a similar amount of them. To spice this question up, I decided to take it to the extreme: "What's the smallest company that has the most domains?"
stories.title: Ask HN: What's the smallest company that has the most domains?

stories.text:
While going through other HN threads, I noticed many participants in the discussions recommend that organizations noticing suspicious repo cloning activity start scanning source code for credentials. This is a great advice to limit the damage.

But where do you start when you find thousands of secrets exposed?
stories.title: Surviving the GitHub OAuth hack – remediating thousands of hardcoded credentials
